snippet: With promises of luxury hotels, conference centers, amusement parks and thousands of jobs, as well as gambling, several proposals for sites near New York City top $1 billion.
abstract: Seventeen companies unveil proposals for casino-resorts in New York State communities, officially kicking off competition for four state gambling licenses that are up for grabs; several proposals, with promises of luxury hotels, conference centers, adventure parks and thousands of job opportunities, top $1 billion.
lead_paragraph: With promises of luxury hotels, conference centers, amusement parks and thousands of jobs, as well as gambling, several proposals for sites near New York City top $1 billion.

headline.main: 17 Companies File Casino Plans With New York State in Push for 4 Gambling Licenses
headline.print_headline: 17 Companies File Casino Plans With State in Push for 4 Gambling Licenses
